title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-4.4 - Filing and distribution of the facility closure application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-4.4 - Filing and distribution of the facility closure application

State Regulations
A complete application for permit modification for
facility closure must be filed and distributed in accordance with section
383-3.5
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
